thread.title: Chelsea’s new Nike kit for 2017/18 season leaked on social media and looks like 1987 shirt
thread.title_full: Chelsea’s new Nike kit for 2017/18 season leaked on social media and looks like 1987 shirt

author: Claire Bloomfield
title: Chelsea’s new Nike kit for 2017/18 season leaked on social media and looks like 1987 shirt
text:
8 Leaked: Chelsea’s 2017/18 away shirt 
The images suggest Nike have opted for a diamond design on all three shirts next season, although variations of the home shirt in particular are now also doing the rounds on social media. 
Most read in football leg-break horror Seamus Coleman set for surgery on potential career-threatening injury after his leg is snapped in half by Neil Taylor's wild tackle LIONHEART Brave Bradley Lowery gets the biggest cheer at Wembley as he leads out the England team with goal hero and best mate Jermain Defoe Not good enough Antonio Conte has sensationally rejected the chance to sign Neymar in a £155m deal from Barcelona TV TIMES What TV channel is England vs Lithuania on, what time is kick-off and what is the latest team news? Big neym signing Man Utd in 'talks with Neymar's agent over £173m move and £416k-a-week deal' 'I don't even like football' Neil Taylor is hammered on Twitter after breaking Seamus Coleman’s leg… but it’s an ex-councillor not the Wales defender taking the brunt of the abuse 
Chelsea could be going into the new era with the sportswear giants next season with a Premier League title to defend. 
Stamford Bridge boss Antonio Conte hailed their victory over Stoke as significant, and with Chelsea leading by ten points after 28 matches, he went on to suggest his side will need just seven wins from their remaining games to clinch the title. Alamy Chelsea’s play-off match with Middlesbrough in 1988 was marred by crowd trouble News Group Newspapers Ltd
